title: Anion exchange membrane water electrolysis over superparamagnetic ferrites
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,2575-2586
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00170B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tiago Fernandes, Ramsundar Rani Mohan, Laura Donk, Wei Chen, Chiara Biz, Mauro Fianchini, Saeed Kamali, Siavash Mohammad Alizadeh, Anna Kitayev, Aviv Ashdot, Miles Page, Laura M. Salonen, Sebastian Kopp, Ervin Tal Gutelmacher, José Gracia, Marta Costa Figueiredo, Yury V. Kolen’ko
The large-scale batch synthesis of several superparamagnetic spinel ferrites is reported to investigate their performance as catalysts for industrial-scale anionic exchange membrane water electrolysis (AEMEL).
